results.title: Simvastatin inhibits IFN regulatory factor 4 expression and Th17 cell differentiation in CD4+ T cells derived from patients with multiple sclerosis.
results.text_hl: Subsequent to the clinical trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis_Relapsing_Remitting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020529 @@@relapsing remitting multiple sclerosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis_Relapsing_Remitting</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020529 @@@RR MS@@@), which demonstrated the ability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to inhibit new @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ @DISEASE_Central_Nervous_System_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002493 @@@CNS lesion@@@ formation, the current in vitro study has characterized the mechanisms through which @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibits Th17 cell differentiation.

citations.NLM: Zhang X, Tao Y, Troiani L, Markovic-Plese S. Simvastatin inhibits IFN regulatory factor 4 expression and Th17 cell differentiation in CD4+ T cells derived from patients with multiple sclerosis. J Immunol. 2011 Sep 15;187(6):3431-7. PMID: 21856936
citations.BibTeX: @article{21856936, title={Simvastatin inhibits IFN regulatory factor 4 expression and Th17 cell differentiation in CD4+ T cells derived from patients with multiple sclerosis.}, author={Zhang X and Tao Y and Troiani L and Markovic-Plese S}, journal={J Immunol}, volume={187}, number={6}, pages={3431-7}}
